data.eml:eml: A partial revision of the Ameerega hahneli complex (Anura: Dendrobatidae) and a new cryptic species from the East-Andean versant of Central Peru

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Twomey, Evan, Brown, Jason L. (2008): A partial revision of the Ameerega hahneli complex (Anura: Dendrobatidae) and a new cryptic species from the East-Andean versant of Central Peru. Zootaxa 1757: 49-65, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181829
